chapters.title: Chapter 50: Meetings at the EyeChapter 51: Against the ShadowChapter 52: There Is Neither Beginning Nor EndChapter 53: The Wheel TurnsGlossary
chapters.info: Farede, p. 658 (702)—Panarch of Tarabon near the end of the War of the Hundred Years. She was responsible for promulgating the calendar that now bears her name, which measures years of the New Era (NE), the first of which marked the (arbitrary) end of the War.
